FuncDef: The display ntp-service trace command displays the path to a reference clock source.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A local device can be configured to trace the path to a reference clock source when the local device is synchronized with the reference clock source through any NTP server chain.
The display ntp-service trace command does not support an IPv6 clock source.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
